page.title: 12Famous People of Upton.
page.content: {Dr. John Dee}1527 to 1608 was Court astronomer to Elizabeth 1st, astrologer, mathematician and founder if the British Empire, he died in poverty.{Bishop Miles Smith}translater of the Bible into many Eastern languages. The infamous{Thomas Bound, his ghost haunted Upton for many years.{Sir Henry Bromley}Squire of Ham Court presided at the trial of Mary Queen of Scots.{Frederick Carpenter {Skey}1798 to 1872 distinguished surgeon, writer, lecturer and teacher. {Admiral Sir William Tennant}directed evacuation of Dunkirk beaches second world war. Commanded battle ship Repulse, saved when sunk by Japanese in 1941.{Mrs Emily Lawson}wife of Upton rector diarist and historian wrote "The Nation in the Parish".
